revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Θεοφραστου του Ερεσιου Περι Των Λιθων Βιβλιον. Theophrastus's History of Stones. With an English version, and notes, Includi..."
revision.text: Possibly: Θεοφραστου του Ερεσιου Περι Των Λιθων Βιβλιον. Theophrastus's History of Stones. With an English version, and notes, Including the Modern History of the gems described by that Author; and of many other of the Native Fossils. By Theophrastus. 2nd ed. (London : printed for the author, in St. James's-Street: And sold by L. Davis, in Holborn...MDCCLXXIV. [1774]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2463789~S1
